EmailTemplate.Body:
Hello $identityModel.get("firstName") $identityModel.get("lastName"),
Your sponsored account of the type $accountType will expire in two weeks. Please communicate with the Requestor of this account if you require an extension.
End Date :$spTools.formatDate($identityModel.get("contractEndDate"),"yyyy-MM-dd")
Requestor: $identityModel.get("requesterDisplayName")
If this end date is correct, no action is required. If the account is already no longer required, please let us know so that we can terminate access.
Sincerely, AccessBoston
